programme.title: Terrifier
programme.desc: After being resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to the timid town of Miles County where he targets a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween night.

programme.title: We Have Always Lived in the Castle
programme.desc: Two sisters live in isolation with their deranged uncle following the deaths of the rest of their family. When a cousin comes to visit, family secrets and scandals unravel. Based on the beloved Shirley Jackson novel.

programme.title: She Came Back
programme.desc: The terrifying journey of Charley who, after a near-death experience, is haunted by her relationship with her deceased mother.

programme.title: SPLINTER
programme.desc: Trapped in a gas station by a parasite, a couple and an escaped convict must find a way to survive.

programme.title: Impossible Monsters
programme.desc: Dr. Rich Freeman (Tony Award winner Santino Fontana), an ambitious and well-liked psychology professor, pursues a sleep study with a focus on nightmares, dreams, and sleep paralysis -- the success of which would result in a lucrative grant. As the line between dreams and reality blur, a member of the study is murdered, and everything begins to unravel, leaving Rich fighting to make things right.

programme.title: Bigfoot Country
programme.desc: Some say Bigfoot is just a hoax, but when a group of hikers go deep into the woods after being warned by a guide that has encountered a Sasquatch, they begin to realize that they are not alone...

programme.title: Chronicles of the Ghostly Tribe
programme.desc: A soldier is working in a snowcapped mountain when an explosion reveals bizarre fossils hidden deep in the caverns. What they discover next will change human history forever.

programme.title: Shark Girl
programme.desc: When a beautiful young influencer survives a mysterious shark attack, she becomes a monstrous apex predator, hunting and feeding in sunny Venice beach, California.

programme.title: Mermaid Down
programme.desc: A mermaid is ripped from the Pacific, her tail is chopped off and she's thrown into a mental home where no one believes she is a mermaid.

programme.title: The Mimic
programme.desc: A classic Korean ghost story gets a horrifying new spin. As the mother of a missing child takes in a lost girl she finds in the woods, she soon begins to wonder if she is even human.

programme.title: Wraith
programme.desc: After living in an old mansion for almost 10 years a family suddenly discovers a ghost-like presence trying to communicate with them.

programme.title: Big Ass Spider!
programme.desc: The unlikely heroic duo of a blue-collar exterminator and Latino security guard must save the day when a military major loses control of a giant spider rampaging through the city of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Shark Girl
programme.desc: When a beautiful young influencer survives a mysterious shark attack, she becomes a monstrous apex predator, hunting and feeding in sunny Venice beach, California.

programme.title: Monsters
programme.desc: After Earth has suffered an alien invasion a journalist escort an American tourist through an infected zone.

programme.title: The Golem
programme.desc: A mystical woman must save her village from invaders, but the entity she conjures to protect them is a far greater evil.
